name: Binoculars
description: +12" to Inspect range when surveying Hot Spots or Mission Objectives.

name: Electric Juice
description: Immediately grants 2 additional actions. Only 1 action allowed the following turn.

name: Gas Mask
description: No Will check required for Smoke or Fumes.

name: Med-Kit
description: Replace 1 Wound with 2 Pinned. If used by Bone Doc, replace 1 Wound with 1 Pinned.

name: Red Dot Sight
description: For Pistols, SMGs, Shotguns and Assault Rifles. +1 to Ranged Attack Combat Ability Roll at half the weapon's effective range or less.

name: Detector
description: +2 to Will Check when Searching an Anomaly.

name: Tool Kit
description: +2 to all Mechanical Skill Checks and -1 to Action cost.

name: NODs
description: Negates Dark and Low Light LOS and Ranged Attack Penalties.

name: Hot Load Ammo
description: Ranged Weapon only. +1 to Weapon Damage. Enough for 1 mission.

name: Scope
description: Assault Rifles, Battle Rifles and Sniper Rifles only. +1 to Ranged Combat Ability Rolls at greater than half the weapons effective range.

name: Under Barrel Grenade Launcher
description: Assault Rifles only. Adds a 40mm Grenade Launcher Option to a character's weapon.

name: Kevlar Plates
description: +1 to Characters Armor Rating. Can be added twice per crew member.

name: Heavy Weapon Reload
description: +5 ammo of any single type of Limited Ammo weapon.
